type: Tutorial Step - Don’t Forget the Layers!

definition.text: You’ve done this before!  Make sure you add those layers.  Blank charts are no fun.

paragraphs.text: Hover over the Layer Manager and click Add All Mine Layers.
This is an easy step to forget but very important! If there are't any layers under the layer manager, nothing will show up no matter how hard you try.
When layers start to stack up things can get a bit out of hand. It is a good idea to take some time and arrange and collapse the layer nodes and folders to help keep things looking clean.
